Translations.Text: Surely, the ones who believe prospered
those, they, who in their formal prayers are ones who are humble
and they, those who from idle talk, are ones who turn aside
and they, those who the purifying alms are ones who do give
and they, those who of their private parts, are ones who guard
but from their spouses or from what their right hands possessed. Truly, they are ones who are irreproachable
Whoever was looking for something beyond that, then, those, they are the ones who turn away
And those, they who their trusts and their compacts are ones who shepherd
and those, they who over their formal prayers are watchful
those, they are ones who will inherit
those who will inherit Paradise, they are ones who will dwell in it forever
And, certainly, We created the human being from an extraction of clay
Again, We made him into seminal fluid in a stopping place, secure

Again, We created a clot from seminal fluids. Then, We created tissue from the clot. Then, We created bones from tissue. Then, We clothed the bones with flesh. Again, We caused another creation to grow. So blessed be God, the Fairer of the ones who are creators
Again, truly, after that, you will die
Again, truly, you will be raised up on the Day of Resurrection
Certainly, We created above you seven tiers. We had not been ones who are heedless of the creation
